name: Luksong Tinik
description:
Luksong Tinik is inspired by its very namesake from the games played by the Filipino Children. What the player does is straightforward. The player kills the Zombie Kids on a surrealistic area of Bulacan with the player model being a sharp sprite named “Tinik” and it is controlled by tapping the Space button on the keyboard. Hit the Zombies using the tip of Tinik’s Head. Zombies touching Tinik will cause him to die.

Game Controls:

Space - Jump

Esc - Pause

Developers:

John Paulo Putong - Programmer Lead

Ryan Pallan Tubay - Programmer

Caviar Acampado - Programmer/ Audio Design

Craig Cyrus Barretto - Art Lead
